sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB where 1=1 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH = '$DJBH$' and QYRQ > $QSRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select QYRQ from JXDX_DFGZDJB where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select min(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz gx where 1=1 and gx.DJBH = '$DJBH$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH as DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH as DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dfgz dxgx_yjgx_dfgz on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH=JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DFGZDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $TJRQ$ and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $TJRQ$ and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH like '%$DJBH$%' group by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH as DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH as DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dfgz dxgx_yjgx_dfgz on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH=JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DFGZDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $TJRQ$
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $TJRQ$
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH like '%$DJBH$%' group by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH as DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH as DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dfgz dxgx_yjgx_dfgz on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH=JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DFGZDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $TJRQ$ and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $TJRQ$ and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH like '%$DJBH$%' group by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH as DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH as DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_dfgz dxgx_yjgx_dfgz on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH=JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_DFGZDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $TJRQ$
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $TJRQ$
and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH like '%$DJBH$%' group by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DLZH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH,JXDX_DFGZDJB.QYRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH,khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_DFGZ.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_DFGZ.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_DFGZ.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz dxgx_yjgx_dfgz inner join JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB on 1=1 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH=dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH = '$DJBH$' order by dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select distinct JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH,khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_DFGZ.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_DFGZ.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_DFGZ.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz dxgx_yjgx_dfgz inner join JXDX_DFGZDJB JXDX_DFGZDJB on 1=1 and JXDX_DFGZDJB.DJBH=dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.DJBH = '$DJBH$' order by dxgx_yjgx_dfgz.qsrq) a
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_dfgz set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$' and qsrq=(select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_dfgz set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz gx where 1=1 and gx.DJBH = '$DJBH$' and gx.jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_dfgz set jsrq=29991231 where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$' and jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz where 1=1 and DJBH = '$DJBH$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into XTB_HYGXJL_DFGZ(JLDH,GGBZ,KHDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,ZLBL) select $JLDH$,'$GGBZ$',gx.KHDXDH,gx.QSRQ,gx.JSRQ,gx.ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_dfgz gx where 1=1 and gx.DJBH = '$DJBH$' and jsrq=29991231
